original_text:
When he has filled his belly,
    God will vent his burning anger against him
    and rain down his blows on him.
korean_text: 그가 배를 불리려 할 때에 하나님이 맹렬한 진노를 내리시리니 음식을 먹을 때에 그의 위에 비 같이 쏟으시리라

sentences.original_text: When he has filled his belly
God will vent his burning anger against him
sentences.korean_translation: 하나님께서 그에게 타오르는 분노를 쏟으실 것이며

sentences.original_text: and rain down his blows on him
